choices: A fur with a big mouth and bigger appitite.
Part of a team of two bingers.
1.content: The chapter title pretty much says all, but of these types of hungry contenders are you?
1.title: {c:rose} Which Gorger Are You? {/c]

12.content:
I said move it fatty, I am dang hungry and my stomach is getting smaller the longer we stand here looking at all these humans making fools of themselves.

I thought you said this was a contest. Look I am hungry and this food is ugly but I am going to win, no one has beat my yet, I am big furry and getting madder the longer I look at these people touching my banquet.

What will I do with all these humans in my way?
12.title: Big fur hungry

121.content:
Arron was getting impatient "Hurry it up, I'm starved, Rawrrrr" Arron was siick of waiting. *Gulp* Arron had just ate the person who was in front of him "Oooooh that tasted so goood" Arron starts devouring all the humans in his sight. Arron was laying down rubbing his tummy "I haven't eaten like that in a long time"

Arron waddles home to get some sleep.
121.title: Eat the humans

choices: Arron gets sucked into the tv
1212.content: When Aron got home he kicked off his sneaks and wobbles to the kitchen and gets his snacks and waddles to the den to watch some TV, Arron: Let's see whats on the TV. Arron flicks through the channels, Arron: Nothings on.. Arron then Sees something that caught his eyes, It was a Virtual Game Channel, Wiith some interesting games
1212.title: Arron watches tv

choices: The Pig's feet and knuckles contest
14.content:
"MARZI!" You say in a shrill voice "Don't make me do this!"

Your girlfriend, a pretty Cat Fur named Marzipan Cheshire smacks your skinny butt with her tail and pushes you forward

"You're going to enter and you're going to win! Or all my training you will be for naught!"

"But look at all these massive furs!" You complain "I'm just a skinny little human how am I going to compete?!"

Marzipan sighs and turns you around

"Ichabod." She says slowly "Have you forgotten who you are related to? The legendary Ichabod Crane of Washington Irving's famous story? He was as skinny as a rail but could pack away a ton of food for breakfast, lunch and supper if you can't do this Ichy nobody can!"

You gulp and look around nervously "What if I'm expected to eat sweet food?" You ask "You know I can't eat sweets they make me sick!"

"Here" she said putting a pill in your mouth, "That will increase your sugar tolerance at least for a while."

A Large Crocodile makes his way to the podium, "Ladies and Gentlebeasts!" He says in his gruff reptilian voice "The first contests shall now begin...Please choose your contest!"
14.title: The Puny Nerd from Nowhere

141.content:
You enter the mountain of food contest, you are seated between a massive female grizzly bear and an obese male pig, it looks quite a sight.

"The Eating Race will last for ten minutes." Says the Crocodile. "The one who finishes the most food wins the challenge!"

The Contest starts...now!" He pulls the tail feathers of an Anthro Buzzard on a perch his loud squawk signals to start eating.

You waste no time starting with the bottom of the pile, you take a piece of French Bread and using your knife slice it in half

"This is my strategy." You say "I'll make sandwiches and get the most that way."

You take a look at the pig next to you, he shoves an entire glazed ham in his mouth 'Isn't that cannibalism?' You think to yourself

You pile bacon, ham and salami into your sandwich, not wasting anymore time you down it quickly
141.title: The Mountain of Food Contest

1412.content:
The Contest is one minute away from concluding, you still feel fine, you make your way through the the various foods by pacing yourself and giving yourself time to belch in order to release some air (It wouldn't make your mother proud though)

You are halfway through of eating a large winter salami, something happens you begin to feel full, you put the sausage down and put you hand on your forehead wondering how you will be able to continue.

"Something is happening!" Says the Buzzard you think he is referring to you stopping but no he means the pig.

The Pig has crammed several large sausages into his mouth but he looks green almost ill, he lurches forward and vomits

"The Pig has vomited!" Says the Crocodile "The Pig is out of the competition!

You look over at the Bear she seems green around the gills too, she weakly stuffs a piece of pork tenderloin in her mouth and chews pathetically.

"Maybe I can win..." You think to yourself you start eating the salami again, the Buzzard squawks and you know the contest is over.

You put down what you were eating, as The Crocodile inspects the piles...He annouces
1412.title: Pig Gets Disqualified

info.brief_description: A battle of the gluttons, furry & human alike.
info.description:
A new all-you-can-eat reastraunt opens up and hosts an eating contest for attract potential customers. Naturally, Humans enter the contest, but there is also the fat furs, who are pretty good at scarfing down a lot food. And just who will rise above the rest and become top glutton? It's up to you!

Here's how this is gonna work. Unlike the others, this contest will be a 5-round, 16-constentant tournament kind of thing. You can choose to be in the story as either a normal fur (newbies in the girth-growing bussiness), a fat fur (pretty profession stuffing themsleves), a macro fur, (able to cram tons of food in the gullet), or a human (They have been overeating a long time). You can also make the bouts be 1-on-1 or 2-on-2.

What species you and your opponent is (for furs only) and who wins the round is also up to you. To end the story your character must win all five rounds and be titled top glutton. And if your charater passes out you can go on as the opponent.

That's pretty much it. So, pull up a chair, unbuckle your belt, grab a bib, and let the gorging begin!
